Brief.
Initializes the video driver, by setting the initial cursor position, setting it's visibility, enabling the blinking cursor and defining cursor shape.

parameterdescription.para: zero to disable the cursor, not zero to enable the cursor.

briefdescription.para: Updates all changes made to video buffer into screen.
Updates the hole screen with actual video color all colors will be changed.
Sets the cursor's visibility. Zero to turn it off not zero to turn it on.
Increments the position of the cursor by one unit. Automatically resolves new lines and screen scrolling.
Decrements the position of the cursor by one unit. Automatically resolves jumps to previous lines.
Sets the cursor's position.

parameterdescription.para: the new row position.
the new col position.

simplesect.para: the offset from the (0,0) including the attribute byte.

briefdescription.para: Gets the actual cursor's position.

parameterdescription.para: a pointer to int where the actual row position will be returned. Must not be NULL.
a pointer to int where the acutal col position will bie returned. Must not be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Gets the actual default video color.
Set the default video color.

parameterdescription.para: the new video color code

briefdescription.para: Gets the video tab stop.
Sets the video tab stop.
Gets the video vertical tab.
Sets the video vertical tab stop.
Puts a character into the video buffer at the current cursor position.

parameterdescription.para: the character to be putted into the video buffer
the color code of the character

briefdescription.para: Puts a character into the video buffer at the current position and moves the cursor.

parameterdescription.para: the character to be putted into the video buffer

briefdescription.para: Puts a character into the video buffer at the current position and moves the cursor.

parameterdescription.para: the character to be putted into the video buffer
the color code of the character.

memberdef.argsstring: (int c, int color, int row, int col)
memberdef.name: putCharAtFixedPos

briefdescription.para: Puts a character into the video buffer at a given position.

parameterdescription.para: the character to be putted into the video buffer
the color code of the character.
the row position where the character will be putted
the col position where the character will be putted

memberdef.argsstring: (char *s, int *color, int length, int row, int col)
memberdef.name: putColoredStringAtFixedPos

briefdescription.para: Puts a string at a given position.

parameterdescription.para: The string to be putted.
a pointer to int with the color codes for each character or NULL to print with the default video color.
